verses.verse: יֹ֭שֵׁב <S%H3427><s%> Yo-shev He that dwelleth בְּסֵ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> be-Se-ter in the secret עֶלְי֑וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon; place of the most High בְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> be-Tzel under the shadow שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> Dai, of the Almighty יִתְלוֹנָֽן׃ <S%H3885><s%> yit-lo-Nan. shall abide

אֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mar, I will say לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD מַחְסִ֣י <S%H4268><s%> mach-Si [He is] my refuge וּמְצוּדָתִ֑י <S%H4686><s%> u-me-tzu-da-Ti; and my fortress אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai, my God אֶבְטַח־ <S%H982><s%> 'ev-tach- in him will I trust בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu who יַ֭צִּֽילְךָ <S%H5337><s%> Yatz-tzi-le-cha Surely he shall deliver מִפַּ֥ח <S%H6341><s%> mip-Pach thee from the snare יָק֗וּשׁ <S%H3353><s%> ya-Kush, of the fowler מִדֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1698><s%> mid-De-ver pestilence הַוּֽוֹת׃ <S%H1942><s%> hav-Vot. [and] from the noisome

בְּאֶבְרָת֨וֹ׀ <S%H84><s%> be-'ev-ra-To thee with his feathers יָ֣סֶךְ <S%H5526><s%> Ya-sech He shall cover לָ֭ךְ lach וְתַֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> ve-ta-chat- and under כְּנָפָ֣יו <S%H3671><s%> ke-na-Fav and under his wings תֶּחְסֶ֑ה <S%H2620><s%> tech-Seh; shalt thou trust צִנָּ֖ה <S%H6793><s%> tzin-Nah [shall be thy] shield וְֽסֹחֵרָ֣ה <S%H5507><s%> ve-so-che-Rah and buckler אֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H571><s%> a-mit-To. his truth

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not תִ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> Ti-ra Thou shalt not be afraid מִפַּ֣חַד <S%H6343><s%> mip-Pa-chad for the terror לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah; by night מֵ֝חֵ֗ץ <S%H2671><s%> me-Chetz, [nor] for the arrow יָע֥וּף <S%H5774><s%> ya-'Uf [that] flieth יוֹמָֽם׃ <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam. by day

מִ֭דֶּבֶר <S%H1698><s%> Mid-de-ver [Nor] for the pestilence בָּאֹ֣פֶל <S%H652><s%> ba-'O-fel in darkness יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ya-ha-Loch; [that] walketh מִ֝קֶּ֗טֶב <S%H6986><s%> mik-Ke-tev, [nor] for the destruction יָשׁ֥וּד <S%H7736><s%> ya-Shud [that] wasteth צָהֳרָֽיִם׃ <S%H6672><s%> tzo-ho-Ra-yim. at noonday

יִפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> yip-Pol shall fall מִצִּדְּךָ֨׀ <S%H6654><s%> mitz-tzid-de-Cha at thy side אֶ֗לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, A thousand וּרְבָבָ֥ה <S%H7233><s%> u-re-va-Vah and ten thousand מִימִינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3225><s%> mi-mi-Ne-cha; at thy right hand אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, about לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not יִגָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H5066><s%> yig-Gash. [but] it shall not come nigh

רַ֭ק <S%H7535><s%> rak with בְּעֵינֶ֣יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha Only with thine eyes תַבִּ֑יט <S%H5027><s%> tab-Bit; shalt thou behold וְשִׁלֻּמַ֖ת <S%H8011><s%> ve-shil-lu-Mat the reward רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh. and see

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מַחְסִ֑י <S%H4268><s%> mach-Si; [which is] my refuge עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon, [even] the most High שַׂ֣מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> Sam-ta Because thou hast made מְעוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4583><s%> me-'o-Ne-cha. thy habitation

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- No תְאֻנֶּ֣ה <S%H579><s%> te-'un-Neh befall אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah; There shall no evil וְ֝נֶ֗גַע <S%H5061><s%> ve-Ne-ga', thee neither shall any plague לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor יִקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> yik-Rav come nigh בְּאָהֳלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H168><s%> be-'o-ho-Le-cha. thy dwelling

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מַ֭לְאָכָיו <S%H4397><s%> Mal-'a-chav For he shall give his angels יְצַוֶּה־ <S%H6680><s%> ye-tzav-veh- charge לָּ֑ךְ Lach; לִ֝שְׁמָרְךָ֗ <S%H8104><s%> lish-ma-re-cha, over thee to keep בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chei-cha. thee in all thy ways

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in כַּפַּ֥יִם <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pa-yim in [their] hands יִשָּׂא֑וּנְךָ <S%H5375><s%> yis-sa-'U-ne-cha; They shall bear thee up פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- not תִּגֹּ֖ף <S%H5062><s%> tig-Gof lest thou dash בָּאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> ba-'E-ven against a stone רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Le-cha. thy foot

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon שַׁ֣חַל <S%H7826><s%> Sha-chal upon the lion וָפֶ֣תֶן <S%H6620><s%> va-Fe-ten and adder תִּדְרֹ֑ךְ <S%H1869><s%> tid-Roch; Thou shalt tread תִּרְמֹ֖ס <S%H7429><s%> tir-Mos shalt thou trample under feet כְּפִ֣יר <S%H3715><s%> ke-Fir the young lion וְתַנִּֽין׃ <S%H8577><s%> ve-tan-Nin. and the dragon

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because בִ֣י vi חָ֭שַׁק <S%H2836><s%> Cha-shak Because he hath set his love וַאֲפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ <S%H6403><s%> va-'a-fal-le-Te-hu; upon me therefore will I deliver אֲ֝שַׂגְּבֵ֗הוּ <S%H7682><s%> 'a-sag-ge-Ve-hu, him I will set him on high כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' because he hath known שְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mi. my name

יִקְרָאֵ֨נִי׀ <S%H7121><s%> yik-ra-'E-ni He shall call וְֽאֶעֱנֵ֗הוּ <S%H6030><s%> ve-'e-'e-Ne-hu, upon me and I will answer עִמּֽוֹ־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-mov- will be with אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi him בְצָרָ֑ה <S%H6869><s%> ve-tza-Rah; him I [will be] with him in trouble אֲ֝חַלְּצֵ֗הוּ <S%H2502><s%> 'a-chal-le-Tze-hu, I will deliver וַֽאֲכַבְּדֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H3513><s%> Va-'a-chab-be-De-hu. him and honour

אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech With long יָ֭מִים <S%H3117><s%> Ya-mim life אַשְׂבִּיעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7646><s%> 'as-bi-'E-hu; will I satisfy וְ֝אַרְאֵ֗הוּ <S%H7200><s%> ve-'ar-'E-hu, him and shew בִּֽישׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <S%H3444><s%> Bi-shu-'a-Ti. him my salvation
